title: Tsuwamonogatari
description:
Shinsengumi members discuss the "strongest opponents" they have ever fought!　
The first one to open the discussion is the leader of the first squad, Okita Soji,he talks about his battle with Serizawa Kamo of the Shindō Munen-ryū ! The "Duel of the Different Schools of Swordsmanship" was restored to the present day, with many trips back and forth between the Tennen Rishin-ryū and Shindō Munen-ryū dojos!　
The curtain opens on a Bakumatsu sword-fighting manga that no one has ever seen before!
author: Hosokawa Tadataka
